name: Anonymous
comment:
>>37732208
That's a really strong 'maybe' there, anon. It's better if we invest into something that we know will give us a boost -- like HP or a weapon skill.

Also, equating them to stats isn't necessarily valid, I don't think -- consider what other skills the other four jobs could have gotten. I think it's a bit erroneous to label them in such a way right now.
